author: Michael C. Bender
title: Hillary Clinton Says She Regrets Not Firing Former Aide Accused of Sexual Harassment
text:
Hillary Clinton, the Democratic presidential nominee in 2016, said on Tuesday that she regretted protecting a former campaign adviser accused of sexual harassment on her 2008 campaign.
“The short answer is this: If I had to do it again, I wouldn’t,” she wrote on Facebook. The message was posted just moments before President Donald Trump began his first State of the Union speech, and four days after the New York Times first reported on the campaign worker’s behavior.
...
